comment.body:
Site only opens with US VPN  and then it is broken too, likely that cable provider is only allowing their customers to open it.
These rules restore some content on that page though (not all since not available in code):
```
mediacomcable.com#$#.white-overlay { padding-top: 0px !important; padding-bottom: 0px !important; background-color: inherit !important; }
mediacomcable.com#$#.mainContainer.white-overlay::before { position: static !important; content: " " !important; }
```

Please check @zloyden (likely some rule in user filter or maybe ISP is injecting something which AdGuard hides).

issue.title: titantv.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://titantv.com/default.aspx](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftitantv.com%2Fdefault.aspx) ### Comment > Have used TitanTV for years with AdBlock enabled. Recently, TitanTV has gotten aggressive with their anti-adblocker tatics. I used to be able to block the pop-up, and it still works in most regards. I.e., it eliminates all the ads, however, a few seconds after the webpage loads with the ads blocked, the scroll bar on the right disappears and the screen becomes locked. > The scroll bar would disappear and the screen would lock whenever the anti-adblocker warning would pop up. I wonder if there isn't some residual code that is continuing to "pop-up" and lock the screen even though the dialog box and warning text have been successfully blocked. > I've experimented with 'maximizing' the blocked element and a few times I WAS able to completely block the pop-up and prevent the screen from locking. However, I am no longer able to make it work. Please help. ### Screenshots

issue.title: titantv.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://titantv.com/default.aspx](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftitantv.com%2Fdefault.aspx) ### Comment > Have used TitanTV for years with AdBlock enabled. Recently, TitanTV has gotten aggressive with their anti-adblocker tatics. I used to be able to block the pop-up, and it still works in most regards. I.e., it eliminates all the ads, however, a few seconds after the webpage loads with the ads blocked, the scroll bar on the right disappears and the screen becomes locked. > The scroll bar would disappear and the screen would lock whenever the anti-adblocker warning would pop up. I wonder if there isn't some residual code that is continuing to "pop-up" and lock the screen even though the dialog box and warning text have been successfully blocked. > I've experimented with 'maximizing' the blocked element and a few times I WAS able to completely block the pop-up and prevent the screen from locking. However, I am no longer able to make it work. Please help. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/J82PmAW.jpg)
